titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported to the Committee on Rules.
Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported to the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-630, by Mr. Reynolds.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 215.

bill.summary: Waives a specified requirement of rule XIII with respect to a reported resolution providing for consideration of a bill to provide an extension of highway, highway safety, motor carrier safety, transit, and other programs funded out of the Highway Trust Fund pending enactment of a law reauthorizing the Transportation Equity Act for the 21st Century.
